alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Carter; Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Boyd, Greenup and northern Carter Counties through 230 PM EST... At 159 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Dix, or 8 miles northwest of Carter Caves State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grayson, Carter Caves State Park, Greenup, Load, Gesling, Greenbo Lake, Oldtown, Letitia, Rush, Franklin Furnace, Carter, Wurtland, Hopewell, Brushart, Warnock and Grays Branch. This includes Interstate 64 in Kentucky between mile markers 169 and 180. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
